metadata.title: Mitophagy in TGEV infection counteracts oxidative stress and apoptosis

abstract.original_text: apoptosis after TGEV infection. In addition, we demonstrate for the first time that viral nucleocapsid protein (N) is located in mitochondria and mitophagosome during virus infection or be expressed alone. Those results provide a novel perspective for further improvement of prevention and treatment in TGEV infection. These results suggest that TGEV infection induce mitophagy to promote cell survival and possibly viral infection.

sentences.segment_text: In addition , we demonstrate for the first time that viral nucleocapsid protein ( N ) is located in mitochondria and mitophagosome during virus infection or be expressed alone .
Those results provide a novel perspective for further improvement of prevention and treatment in TGEV infection .
These results suggest that TGEV infection induce mitophagy to promote cell survival and possibly viral infection .
